action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
#script
sleep(30)
Install-WindowsFeature -Name Failover-Clustering -IncludeManagementTools

#script
print "EXECUTION_MODE=LOCAL"

$Script = {

  $DOMAINNAME=(Get-WmiObject Win32_ComputerSystem).Domain

  Install-WindowsFeature -IncludeAllSubFeature -ErrorAction Stop "Net-Framework-Core"
  $setupDriveLetter = "D:"
  $setupPath = "$setupDriveLetter\setup.exe"
  $SilentArgs = "/IACCEPTSQLSERVERLICENSETERMS /Q /ACTION=InstallFailoverCluster /UpdateEnabled=False /INDICATEPROGRESS=True /FEATURES=SQLENGINE,REPLICATION,FULLTEXT,DQ,SSMS,ADV_SSMS /INSTALLSHAREDDIR=`"C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server`" /INSTALLSHAREDWOWDIR=`"C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SQL Server`" /INSTANCENAME=`"MSSQLSERVER`" /SQMREPORTING=False /INSTANCEID=`"MSSQLSERVER`" /INSTANCEDIR=`"C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server`" /FAILOVERCLUSTERDISKS=`"Data`" `"Logs`" /FAILOVERCLUSTERGROUP=`"SQL Server (MSSQLSERVER)`" /FAILOVERCLUSTERIPADDRESSES=`"IPv4;@@{MSSQL_VIP}@@;Cluster Network 1;255.255.240.0`" /FAILOVERCLUSTERNETWORKNAME=`"@@{SQL_CLUSTER_NAME}@@`" /AGTSVCACCOUNT=`"@@{SQL_CREDS.username}@@`" /AGTSVCPASSWORD=@@{SQL_CREDS.secret}@@ /SQLCOLLATION=`"Latin1_General_CI_AI`" /SQLSVCACCOUNT=`"@@{SQL_CREDS.username}@@`" /SQLSVCPASSWORD=@@{SQL_CREDS.secret}@@ /SQLSYSADMINACCOUNTS=`"$DOMAINNAME\Domain Admins`" /INSTALLSQLDATADIR=`"F:\MSSQL`" /SQLUSERDBLOGDIR=`"G:\MSSQL`" /SQLTEMPDBLOGDIR=`"G:\MSSQL`""
  $validExitCodes = @(0)
  $install = Start-Process -FilePath $setupPath -ArgumentList $silentArgs -Wait -NoNewWindow -PassThru
  $install.WaitForExit()
  $exitCode = $install.ExitCode
  $install.Dispose()
  Write-Output "SQL Failover Cluster Installation exited with `'$exitCode`'."
      if ($validExitCodes -notcontains $exitCode) {
          Write-Output "Running [`"$setupPath`" $silentArgs] was not successful. Exit code was '$exitCode'. See log for possible error messages."

  }

}

$adminname="@@{DOMAIN_CRED.username}@@"
$adminpassword = ConvertTo-SecureString -asPlainText -Force -String "@@{DOMAIN_CRED.secret}@@"
$credential = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential($adminname,$adminpassword)
   
Invoke-Command -ComputerName @@{address}@@ -Credential $credential -Authentication Credssp $Script

$Script = {

$DOMAINNAME=(Get-WmiObject Win32_ComputerSystem).Domain

Install-WindowsFeature -IncludeAllSubFeature -ErrorAction Stop "Net-Framework-Core"
$setupDriveLetter = "D:"
$setupPath = "$setupDriveLetter\setup.exe"
$SilentArgs = "/IACCEPTSQLSERVERLICENSETERMS /Q /ACTION=AddNode /UpdateEnabled=False /INDICATEPROGRESS=True /INSTANCENAME=`"MSSQLSERVER`" /SQMREPORTING=False /FAILOVERCLUSTERGROUP=`"SQL Server (MSSQLSERVER)`" /CONFIRMIPDEPENDENCYCHANGE=False /FAILOVERCLUSTERIPADDRESSES=`"IPv4;@@{MSSQL_VIP}@@;Cluster Network 1;255.255.252.0`" /FAILOVERCLUSTERNETWORKNAME=`"@@{SQL_CLUSTER_NAME}@@`" /AGTSVCACCOUNT=`"@@{SQL_CREDS.username}@@`" /AGTSVCPASSWORD=@@{SQL_CREDS.secret}@@ /SQLSVCACCOUNT=`"@@{SQL_CREDS.username}@@`" /SQLSVCPASSWORD=@@{SQL_CREDS.secret}@@"
$validExitCodes = @(0)
$install = Start-Process -FilePath $setupPath -ArgumentList $silentArgs -Wait -NoNewWindow -PassThru
$install.WaitForExit()
$exitCode = $install.ExitCode
$install.Dispose()
Write-Output "SQL Failover Cluster Installation exited with `'$exitCode`'."
    if ($validExitCodes -notcontains $exitCode) {
        Write-Output "Running [`"$setupPath`" $silentArgs] was not successful. Exit code was '$exitCode'. See log for possible error messages."

}

}

$adminname="@@{DOMAIN_CRED.username}@@"
$adminpassword = ConvertTo-SecureString -asPlainText -Force -String "@@{DOMAIN_CRED.secret}@@"
$credential = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential($adminname,$adminpassword)
   
Invoke-Command -ComputerName @@{MSSQL2.address}@@ -Credential $credential -Authentication Credssp $Script

attrs.script:
#script
sleep(90)

New-IscsiTargetPortal -TargetPortalAddress @@{PE_DATA_SERVICE_IP}@@
Get-IscsiTarget | Connect-IscsiTarget -IsPersistent $true
Install-WindowsFeature -Name Failover-Clustering -IncludeManagementTools

attrs.script:
# -*- Pre-requisite to enable credssp and set 'Server' role
Enable-WSManCredSSP -Role Server -Force
# -*- Enabling and starting 'msiscsi'
Set-Service -Name msiscsi -StartupType Automatic
Start-Service msiscsi
# -*- Change first Ehternet adapter name to 'Production'
Get-NetAdapter -Name "Ethernet" | Rename-NetAdapter -NewName "Production" -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
# -*- Create VG

attrs.script:
#script
sleep(30)
Install-WindowsFeature -Name Failover-Clustering -IncludeManagementTools

#script
print "EXECUTION_MODE=LOCAL"

$Script = {

  $DOMAINNAME=(Get-WmiObject Win32_ComputerSystem).Domain

  Install-WindowsFeature -IncludeAllSubFeature -ErrorAction Stop "Net-Framework-Core"
  $setupDriveLetter = "D:"
  $setupPath = "$setupDriveLetter\setup.exe"
  $SilentArgs = "/IACCEPTSQLSERVERLICENSETERMS /Q /ACTION=InstallFailoverCluster /UpdateEnabled=False /INDICATEPROGRESS=True /FEATURES=SQLENGINE,REPLICATION,FULLTEXT,DQ,SSMS,ADV_SSMS /INSTALLSHAREDDIR=`"C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server`" /INSTALLSHAREDWOWDIR=`"C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SQL Server`" /INSTANCENAME=`"MSSQLSERVER`" /SQMREPORTING=False /INSTANCEID=`"MSSQLSERVER`" /INSTANCEDIR=`"C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server`" /FAILOVERCLUSTERDISKS=`"Data`" `"Logs`" /FAILOVERCLUSTERGROUP=`"SQL Server (MSSQLSERVER)`" /FAILOVERCLUSTERIPADDRESSES=`"IPv4;@@{MSSQL_VIP}@@;Cluster Network 1;255.255.240.0`" /FAILOVERCLUSTERNETWORKNAME=`"@@{SQL_CLUSTER_NAME}@@`" /AGTSVCACCOUNT=`"@@{SQL_CREDS.username}@@`" /AGTSVCPASSWORD=@@{SQL_CREDS.secret}@@ /SQLCOLLATION=`"Latin1_General_CI_AI`" /SQLSVCACCOUNT=`"@@{SQL_CREDS.username}@@`" /SQLSVCPASSWORD=@@{SQL_CREDS.secret}@@ /SQLSYSADMINACCOUNTS=`"$DOMAINNAME\Domain Admins`" /INSTALLSQLDATADIR=`"F:\MSSQL`" /SQLUSERDBLOGDIR=`"G:\MSSQL`" /SQLTEMPDBLOGDIR=`"G:\MSSQL`""
  $validExitCodes = @(0)
  $install = Start-Process -FilePath $setupPath -ArgumentList $silentArgs -Wait -NoNewWindow -PassThru
  $install.WaitForExit()
  $exitCode = $install.ExitCode
  $install.Dispose()
  Write-Output "SQL Failover Cluster Installation exited with `'$exitCode`'."
      if ($validExitCodes -notcontains $exitCode) {
          Write-Output "Running [`"$setupPath`" $silentArgs] was not successful. Exit code was '$exitCode'. See log for possible error messages."

  }

}

$adminname="@@{DOMAIN_CRED.username}@@"
$adminpassword = ConvertTo-SecureString -asPlainText -Force -String "@@{DOMAIN_CRED.secret}@@"
$credential = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential($adminname,$adminpassword)
   
Invoke-Command -ComputerName @@{address}@@ -Credential $credential -Authentication Credssp $Script

$Script = {

$DOMAINNAME=(Get-WmiObject Win32_ComputerSystem).Domain

Install-WindowsFeature -IncludeAllSubFeature -ErrorAction Stop "Net-Framework-Core"
$setupDriveLetter = "D:"

$SilentArgs = "/IACCEPTSQLSERVERLICENSETERMS /Q /ACTION=AddNode /UpdateEnabled=False /INDICATEPROGRESS=True /INSTANCENAME=`"MSSQLSERVER`" /SQMREPORTING=False /FAILOVERCLUSTERGROUP=`"SQL Server (MSSQLSERVER)`" /CONFIRMIPDEPENDENCYCHANGE=False /FAILOVERCLUSTERIPADDRESSES=`"IPv4;@@{MSSQL_VIP}@@;Cluster Network 1;255.255.252.0`" /FAILOVERCLUSTERNETWORKNAME=`"@@{SQL_CLUSTER_NAME}@@`" /AGTSVCACCOUNT=`"@@{SQL_CREDS.username}@@`" /AGTSVCPASSWORD=@@{SQL_CREDS.secret}@@ /SQLSVCACCOUNT=`"@@{SQL_CREDS.username}@@`" /SQLSVCPASSWORD=@@{SQL_CREDS.secret}@@"
$validExitCodes = @(0)

$install.WaitForExit()
$exitCode = $install.ExitCode
$install.Dispose()
Write-Output "SQL Failover Cluster Installation exited with `'$exitCode`'."
    if ($validExitCodes -notcontains $exitCode) {
        Write-Output "Running [`"$setupPath`" $silentArgs] was not successful. Exit code was '$exitCode'. See log for possible error messages."

}

}

$adminname="@@{DOMAIN_CRED.username}@@"
$adminpassword = ConvertTo-SecureString -asPlainText -Force -String "@@{DOMAIN_CRED.secret}@@"
$credential = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential($adminname,$adminpassword)
   
Invoke-Command -ComputerName @@{MSSQL2.address}@@ -Credential $credential -Authentication Credssp $Script

# -*- Change first Ehternet adapter name to 'Production'
